issue.title: gazebo-current depends on libsdformat-dev, but ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins depends on sdformat

content.raw:
While @hsu release a new version to fix of ros-gazebo-pkgs, I've uploaded a new modified revision (bumped revision number) of ros-$distro-gazebo-plugin which depends on libsformat1, for all amd64 versions:
```
ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins_2.4.0-1precise_amd64.deb
ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins_2.4.0-1quantal_amd64.deb
ros-hydro-gazebo-plugins_2.4.0-2precise_amd64.deb
ros-hydro-gazebo-plugins_2.4.0-2quantal_amd64.deb
ros-hydro-gazebo-plugins_2.4.0-2raring_amd64.deb
```

They are available at http://gazebosim.org/assets/distributions/. The way to proceed:
```
sudo apt-get remove gazebo-current sdformat
wget http://gazebosim.org/assets/distributions/<one_of_the_modified_plugin_package.deb>
sudo apt-get install gazebo-current
sudo dpkg -i <one_of_the_modified_plugin_package.deb>
sudo apt-get install drcsim
```

@noonien_soong could you please confirm that this works for you? I can upload the version to the repository if the new version of ros_gazebo_pkgs is not released meantime.
content.html:
While @hsu release a new version to fix of ros-gazebo-pkgs, I've uploaded a new modified revision (bumped revision number) of ros-$distro-gazebo-plugin which depends on libsformat1, for all amd64 versions:

ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins_2.4.0-1precise_amd64.deb
ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins_2.4.0-1quantal_amd64.deb
ros-hydro-gazebo-plugins_2.4.0-2precise_amd64.deb
ros-hydro-gazebo-plugins_2.4.0-2quantal_amd64.deb
ros-hydro-gazebo-plugins_2.4.0-2raring_amd64.deb

They are available at http://gazebosim.org/assets/distributions/. The way to proceed:

sudo apt-get remove gazebo-current sdformat
wget http://gazebosim.org/assets/distributions/<one_of_the_modified_plugin_package.deb>
sudo apt-get install gazebo-current
sudo dpkg -i <one_of_the_modified_plugin_package.deb>
sudo apt-get install drcsim

@noonien_soong could you please confirm that this works for you? I can upload the version to the repository if the new version of ros_gazebo_pkgs is not released meantime.
